comment: Hi, I am Using Google Translate for 4 years. It was perfect but, Now when you have changed the interface, it is not working fast as it was working earlier. My issue is now it shows only one meaning of a word and also it doesn't shows the meaning in sentences as it was showing. Please fix it.
key sentence: Key words: meaning of words in sentences
the function of activity: The activity facilitates translation and navigation:Search, menu, navigate, history, handwriting, options, text entry, paste, language swap, and settings management for user interaction and feedback.
